news.title: Citizens in Bengaluru peeved over unfair property tax
news.para: This slab system is affecting those who bought corner sites in public auctions. For example, the BDA fixed Rs 900 for a site measuring 9x12 sq mts (108 sq mts). The next slab is 12x18 sq mt and the property tax for this site is around Rs 1,800.

news.title: Interest waiver helps ULBs in Andhra Pradesh to earn 40% more in property tax
news.para: The urban local bodies have collected nearly 40 per cent additional revenue during the current fiscal over the last year’s tax collections.

news.title: Ludhiana: 30% residents yet to pay property tax; 20% fine from today
news.para: The civic officials claimed that as per the record available with the municipal corporation, there are around 2.3 lakh taxable properties in the city. Out of these, over 67,000 property owners (almost 30%) are yet to pay their taxes as of now.

news.title: Kolhapur civic body's property tax collection likely to hit Rs 80 crore
news.para: On Thursday, the revenue earned from property tax touched Rs75 crore. ​​The authorities expect another Rs 3-4 crore to pour into the civic coffers by the close of accounts on March 31.

news.title: Lucknow development body to organise camp of single window system for registry
news.para: The decision was taken in a review meeting headed by LDA chairperson Roshan Jacob. She directed officials to complete all housing scheme related official paper work and remain present at the camp.

news.title: Chosen builder to finish redevelopment, not Mhada, petitioners tell Bombay HC
news.para: Justices Gautam Patel and Neela Gokhale were hearing a petition about 44 members of Ratilal Mansion at Parekh Street who have not only been out of their homes since 2009, but not received transit rent since 2013.

news.title: Property registration rush ahead of new ready reckoner rates in Maharashtra
news.para: Property registration officials said citizens are carrying out last-minute property registrations to avoid the new RR rates that will come in effect from April 1.

news.title: Amazon leases over six lakh sq ft of office space in Bengaluru
news.para: The web commerce company registered the document in February for a 60-year lease, and will pay rent of ₹62 per sq ft, the lease record shared by Propstack showed.

news.title: MahaRERA issues notices to 261 projects with slow progress
news.para: The projects in all have a total of 45,539 flats, of these 26,178 flats are booked by home buyers. The MahaRERA has issued these notices only on the basis of the information submitted to it by the developers.

news.title: Avener Capital buys over Rs 100-crore luxury duplex in Mumbai's Worli
news.para: The apartment spread over 9,593 sq ft on the 21st and 22nd floor of the tower Oberoi Three Sixty West is valued at Rs 1.04 lakh per sq ft basis the total consideration. The buyers have purchased the apartment from the project developer Oberoi Realty and the deal was registered on March 24. The deal has attracted stamp duty of over Rs 2.90 crore.

news.title: China's Country Garden posts 90% dip in 2022 core profit, record net loss
news.para: The company reported on Thursday a 90% drop in core profit for 2022 and a record net loss, hurt by a sluggish property market and a debt crisis in the sector.

news.title: Axis Bank, Shriram Housing Finance announce partnership for co-lending
news.para: ​Through this partnership, both the lenders will offer secured MSME (Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises) loans and home loans to the middle and low-income segment borrowers based in rural and semi-urban regions, a joint statement said.

news.title: Rose Valley: ED attaches assets worth Rs 159 crore in money laundering case
news.para: ​A provisional order for attachment of assets has been issued under the Prevention of Money Laundering Act (PMLA) and as many as 139 immovable properties consisting land, flats, commercial and office space, shops etc. registered in the name of various companies of Rose Valley Group and its directors in Tripura, West Bengal, Andaman and Nicobar Islands, have been frozen, the agency said in a statement.

news.title: Revised estimate for Kochi metro phase II gets cabinet nod
news.para: The delay in land acquisition and commencement of the works have already caused the escalation of the entire project cost. The cabinet’s decision to grant approval for the revised estimate is expected to speed up the works on the second phase of the Metro line.

news.title: Nuveen invests $30 million in Aviom India Housing Finance
news.para: The primary investment size is $20 million with the balance is through secondary deals, an industry source familiar with the matter said.
